data.title: Lightweight Engineering
data.description:
Learn the fundamental principles and rules of lightweight design.

Deepen your understanding of shape optimization thanks to generative design and get a first insight on additive manufacturing and lightweighting strategies. You will learn basic rules for weight optimization as well as cost management.

title: STUDENTS
description: Challenge yourself, show off your talents, sharpen your skills, and boost your employability.

data.title: Sustainability Challenge
data.description:
The world is overflowing with plastic waste! The global community is starting to embrace the challenge presented by all of the plastic we create.

The solution? Designing a better world. Not a world without plastic, but a world in which plastic is used in the right places and as sustainably as possible.

data.title: FIRST Robotics Competition
data.description:
Combining the excitement of sport with the rigors of science and technology.

The FIRST Robotics Competition is an international high school robotics competition that gives students real-world engineering experience.

data.title: GoFly
data.description:
We’re calling on all inventors and doers to make human flight a reality by building the world’s first personal flying device for anyone, anywhere.

Over the next two years, teams will compete to win $2,000,000 in prizes, creating revolutionary technology and accessing the top minds in aerospace.

data.title: Formula Student
data.description:
Your team will be challenged to conceive, design, fabricate, develop, and compete with small, formula-style vehicles.

It's your chance to demonstrate and prove both your creativity and engineering skills on a worldwide level.

data.title: SAE Aero Design
data.description:
Compress a typical aircraft development program into one year, a real-life systems engineering experience.

You will explore conceptual design, manufacturing, system integration/test, and sell‐off through demonstration.

data.title: Base11 - Space Challenge
data.description:
Are you ready to launch to space?

The Base 11 Space Challenge is a $1M + prize for a student-led team to design, build and launch a liquid-propelled, single stage rocket to an altitude of 100 kilometers (the Karman Line) by December 30, 2021.

data.title: RE-Engineering Australia
data.description: Several challenges available in the STEM range: F1 in Schools, Subs in Schools, Jaguar Primary School Challenge, Land Rover 4x4 in Schools

data.title: World Solar Challenge
data.description: The World Solar Challenge, or the Bridgestone World Solar Challenge since 2013, tied to the sponsorship of Bridgestone Corporation is the world's most well-known solar-powered car race event.

data.title: Shell Eco-marathon
data.description:
Shell Eco-marathon is a world-wide energy efficiency competition sponsored by Shell.

Participants build automotive vehicles to achieve the highest possible fuel efficiency. There are two vehicle classes within Shell Eco-marathon: Prototype and UrbanConcept.

data.title: Course En Cours
data.description: Concours pédagogique pour collégiens et lycéens autour des sciences, de la technologie et de l'Ingénierie avec une mini-f1 à moteur électrique.

data.title: Foil Composites Challenge
data.description:
Avez-vous déjà rêvé de voler sur l'eau ? Êtes-vous préoccupé par votre empreinte carbone ?

Alors tentez de concevoir et simuler l'hydrofoil de demain, n'utilisant que le vent comme source d'energie !
